categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Goldhawk was a YT-1300 light freighter in service of the Rebel Alliance. It served in the Airam sector during the Rebellion's operations there.

Assigned to the new-built starship component factory Soren, Goldhawk participated in the Imperial attack there. With Soren losing shield strength, it sought to escape with select personnel aboard. Unfortunately for its crew and passengers, the Galactic Empire's starfighters shot it down.
